mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_address ( aid,uid, name,phone, province_Code,province_Name, city_Code,city_Name, area_Code,area_Name, address,receiving_Time, created_User,created_Time, modified_User,modified_Time ) VALUES ( #{aid},#{uid}, #{name},#{phone}, #{province_Code},#{province_Name}, #{city_Code},#{city_Name}, #{area_Code},#{area_Name}, #{address},#{receiving_Time}, #{created_User},#{created_Time}, #{modified_User},#{modified_Time} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid}
SELECT aid, name,phone, province_Code,province_Name, city_Code,city_Name, area_Code,area_Name, address,receiving_Time, FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY modified_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_address SET name=#{name},phone=#{phone}, province_Code=#{province_Code},province_Name=#{province_Name}, city_Code=#{city_Code},city_Name={city_Name}, area_Code=#{area_Code},area_Name=#{area_Name}, address=#{address},receiving_Time=#{receiving_Time}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE aid=#{aid}
